Sorry for my poor English , from young till now have phobia visiting dental , due to tooth decay have no choice but too book an appointment with dental , today went in to have my tooth extracted surprisingly the whole procedure took only 15min with totally no pain at all :) the nurse and the doc is very professional and the charges are reasonable too . All of them are very kind and friendly cause due to I have many doubts and phobia , will be going there again for teeth cleaning , strongly recommended! During the past one year of having braces done here, service has been impeccable - the staff are always friendly and super helpful, especially whenever I needed urgent reviews or rescheduling appointments. Dr Sathy has been awesome as well, offering useful advice and making sure my journey went smoothly. Thank you for everything! ðŸ’¯ðŸ˜‡

Dr Brendan Lee is an amazingly good, confident and patient dentist who does his very best to assure his patients and takes his time going about the procedures. Always checking in if the patient is feeling OK. Highly recommend Dr Brendan Lee.

I have visited Q & M Tampines a few times and what a great experience it was! I was warmly welcomed by the dental assistant at reception, Ms Huang Enyin. The dentists, Dr Koh & Dr Sathyendren were highly professional - knowledgeable, gentle and took the time to explain everything clearly. I really appreciated the attention to detail and care taken to make me feel comfortable throughout my visit. I can highly recommend this clinic for your dental care needs.
